22-021ED.summary: Recommendation to approve the revolving loan application in the amount $35,000 for Coco's Bistro located at 2300 E. Pacific Coast Highway, Long Beach, CA 90804Eric Romero, Economic Development Officer, spokeAndria Martinez, Field Director, NGC spoke provided a presentationCommissioner Cohn spokeAndria Martinez, Field Director, NGC spoke dial Commissioner Cohn spoke Andria Martinez, Field Director, NGC spokeCommissioner Metoyer spokeEric Romero, Economic Development Officer, spokeCommissioner Cohn spokeAndria Martinez, Field Director, NGC spokeEric Romero, Economic Development Officer, spokeAndria Martinez, Field Director, NGC spokeCommissioner Cohn spokeEric Romero, Economic Development Officer, spokeCommissioner Cohn spokeJayro Sandoval, City of LB Economic Development, spokeCommissioner Cohn spokePage 2 of 6411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARDVIA TELECONFERENCE, 9:00 AMFRIDAY, FEBRUARY 25, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT COMMISSION REVOLVING LOAN SUBCOMMITTEE MINUTESA motion was made by Commissioner Cohn, seconded by Commissioner Metoyer, to approve recommendation.  With the following condition: Borrowers shall secure technical assistance from the Long Beach Small Business Development Center or another service provider to support their business operations. Examples of the technical assistance the borrowers should secure include, but are not limited to business planning, financial administration and operations, and marketing. The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 2 - Cohn and MetoyerAbsent: 1 - Larkins3.
